entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon then becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
